instruction: Generate an example of how the given technology is being used in the industry.
output: AI is being used in healthcare to automate operational tasks such as scheduling and patient intake forms, as well as providing intelligent insights for better diagnostics. AI-powered chatbots are being used to answer questions related to medical procedures, medications and insurance, and AI-driven image recognition can be used to detect medical conditions from scans and images without the need for expensive and time-consuming tests.
